title: Ruthless Intent
description:
Fourteen years stolen. An innocent man condemned to life without parole. 
Zain Ryder’s life was destroyed when he was arrested for murder, and sentenced to a lifetime behind bars. All because of one person’s witness testimony. When new evidence comes to light, Zain is released.A free man with one revenge.His plan is as relentless as it is cruel.1. Get out of prison2. Find the girl who put him there.3. Make her pay.But while he weaves his web of revenge, secrets unravel and unexpected truths come to light, blurring the lines between victim and villain.
In a game of vengeance and passion, can Zain find redemption, or will he lose himself in the torment he seeks to inflict?
This is a slow burn, enemies-to-lovers, blackmailed into marriage, revenge, forced proximity, slight age-gap, with a slightly twisted take on brother's best friend, psychological romance duology with a guaranteed HEA at the end of book 2.Please read the warnings at the start of the book.
author: L. Ann
